Sensory-context-sensitive real-time daemon - this is a real-time daemon with an explicit sensory context. This is the daemon counterpart of RealTimeSenseFuse. `class `**`RealTimeSenseDaemon`**` :   `[`RealTimeDaemon`](../object/RealTimeDaemon.html)
